project_tech_stack.text: DotNet, Umbraco, CSS(3), SASS, JavaScript & jQuery

project_main_text.text: Value Retail specialises in the creation and operation of luxury outlet shopping destinations, the Village Collection in Europe and China. This was the largest and most complex project I have been involved in, in terms of the thinking behind the architecture, design and build. The brief was to create a set of versatile templates which will enable all 10 villages to create their own stand alone site according to their personal needs and requirements.
